org.jbiowh.core.dbms.sql

Class SQLTableColumns

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.jbiowh.core.dbms.sql.SQLTableColumns

  • public class SQLTableColumns
extends Observable
    This Class is the columns handler in a SQLTable
    Since:
    Aug 8, 2012
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    rvera

      • addColumn

        public void addColumn(String name,
             String type,
             boolean PK,
             boolean NN,
             boolean UQ,
             boolean AI,
             Object def)
        Add a column to the handler. If the column name variable is null or empty the column key will be column size
        Parameters:
        name - the column's name
        type - the column's data type
        PK - true is this column is PK
        NN - true is this column is NN
        UQ - true is this column is UQ
        AI - true is this column is AI
        def - the column's default value

        Remove the column by its number

        number - the column's number
